name: AIR FORCE SERGEANTS ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: FY 2018 funding and the FY 2018 National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA).  Specifically, seeking a full military pay raise and to preserve and protect earned healthcare and related benefits.
